ygData.subject: Re: Minotaur Breastplate?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Makes sense (actually it doesn t make physical sense, but it does make logical sense :-).  Kinda reminds me of the highway signs above a lane that say
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 22 Sep 1999, John Robertson wrote:
> kim@... wrote:
> > On Tue, 21 Sep 1999, John Robertson wrote:
> > >
> > > I believe it is, but it is medium sized only, so humans
> > > and half elves only. It uses the chain model.
> >
> > The odd thing is, high elves and wood elves are supposed to be
> > able to wear medium armor.
>
> Yes, but there are some items that I refer to as "<whatever> sized only" which
> really means "only races that can wear size <whatever> only". There are several
> examples actually, though usually a size small issue, like the kaladim scarab
> armour which is "small size only" (halflings dwarves and gnomes only).

Makes sense (actually it doesn't make physical sense, but it
does make logical sense :-). Kinda reminds me of the highway
signs above a lane that say "Exit Only." Does that mean that
lane will only exit the highway (i.e. the next lane over may
exit as well), or does it mean only that lane exits the
highway (i.e. the next lane over cannot exit).

:-)

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
